name: Amexio
description: Amexio Box can be easily wrapped around any other component and configure using the different responsive styling.

properties.name: header-align
properties.description: User can enable header of card by setting this flag to true..

properties.name: footer
properties.description: User can enable footer of card by setting this flag to true.

properties.name: show
properties.description: User can bind variable to this and hide/unhide card based on requirement..

properties.name: height
properties.description: User can set the height to body..
